reason: Bitcoin is consolidating in a tight range under $70,000, indicating a struggle to break higher, potentially signifying a distribution phase ahead of key macroeconomic data (U.S. jobs report). Negative news surrounding major exchanges (Coinbase target cut, Kraken CFO firing) adds to market caution, despite positive long-term developments in cross-chain technology and Ethereum's AI integration. This creates a highly uncertain environment with elevated risk.
headlines: Struggling Coinbase gets price target cut from JPMorgan ahead of Thursday earnings
Tether invests in LayerZero Labs as it doubles down on cross-chain tech, agentic finance
Bitcoin remains in tight range under $70,000 ahead of Wednesday's U.S. jobs report
Crypto exchange Kraken fires chief financial officer ahead of long-awaited IPO
Vitalik Buterin outlines how Ethereum could play a key role in the future of AI
